movies.title: Ghost in the Shell Arise: Border 1 - Ghost Pain
movies.plot: In this prequel set one year after the fourth World War, cyborg and hacker extraordinaire Motoko Kusanagi from the military's 501st Secret Unit finds herself wrapped up in the investigation of a devastating bombing.
movies.simplePlot: In this prequel set one year after the fourth World War, cyborg and hacker extraordinaire Motoko Kusanagi from the military's 501st Secret Unit finds herself wrapped up in the investigation of a devastating bombing.

biography.bio: Maaya Sakamoto was born on March 31, 1980 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children (2005), Ghost in the Shell (1995) and Ouran High School Host Club (2006). She has been married to Ken'ichi Suzumura since August 8, 2011.
biography.name: Maaya Sakamoto

biography.bio: Ikkyu Juku is an actor, known for Ghost in the Shell Arise: Border 1 - Ghost Pain (2013), Ghost in the Shell: The New Movie (2015) and Ghost in the Shell Arise: Border 2 - Ghost Whisper (2013).
biography.name: Ikkyu Juku

biography.bio: Ken'ichirô Matsuda was born on January 22, 1978 in Saitama Prefecture, Japan. He is an actor, known for Ghost in the Shell: The New Movie (2015), Ghost in the Shell Arise: Border 1 - Ghost Pain (2013) and Ghost in the Shell Arise: Border 2 - Ghost Whisper (2013).
biography.name: Ken'ichirô Matsuda

biography.bio: Tarusuke Shingaki is an actor, known for Ghost in the Shell Arise: Border 1 - Ghost Pain (2013), Ghost in the Shell Arise: Border 3 - Ghost Tears (2014) and Uncharted 2: Among Thieves (2009).
biography.name: Tarusuke Shingaki

biography.bio: Yôji Ueda was born on August 7, 1971 in Kobe, Japan. He is an actor, known for Naruto: Shippûden (2007), Ghost in the Shell Arise: Border 1 - Ghost Pain (2013) and One Punch Man (2015).
biography.name: Yôji Ueda

biography.bio: Miyuki Sawashiro was born on June 2, 1985 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Hunter x Hunter (2011), Tegamibachi (2009) and Appleseed Ex Machina (2007).
biography.name: Miyuki Sawashiro

biography.bio: Mayumi Asano was born on November 13, 1969 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Last Exile (2003), Boogiepop Never Laughs: Boogiepop Phantom (2000) and Hikaru no go (2001).
biography.name: Mayumi Asano

biography.bio: Takanori Hoshino is an actor, known for Gun x Sword (2005), The Garden of Words (2013) and Ghost in the Shell Arise: Border 1 - Ghost Pain (2013).
biography.name: Takanori Hoshino

biography.bio: Yasuhiro Mamiya is an actor, known for Ghost in the Shell Arise: Border 1 - Ghost Pain (2013), Ghost in the Shell Arise: Border 4 - Ghost Stands Alone (2014) and Yaiba: Ninja Gaiden Z (2014).
biography.name: Yasuhiro Mamiya

biography.bio: Kenji Nojima was born on March 16, 1976 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Shadow of the Colossus (2005), Sailor Moon Crystal (2014) and Time of Eve (2010).
biography.name: Kenji Nojima

biography.bio: Atsushi Miyauchi is an actor, known for Ghost in the Shell Arise: Border 1 - Ghost Pain (2013), Ghost in the Shell: The New Movie (2015) and Eden of the East the Movie I: The King of Eden (2009).
biography.name: Atsushi Miyauchi

biography.bio: Kôji Ishii was born on July 1, 1960 in Wakayama, Japan as Kozo Ishii. He is an actor, known for Black Heaven (1999), Pirate Squadron Gokaiger (2011) and El Hazard: The Magnificent World (1995).
biography.name: Kôji Ishii

biography.bio: Yôsuke Akimoto was born on February 5, 1944 in Tokyo, Japan as Yukio Tajika. He is an actor, known for Akira (1988), Perfect Blue (1997) and Pokémon: The First Movie - Mewtwo Strikes Back (1998).
biography.name: Yôsuke Akimoto

actors.character: Department of Defense Deputy Minister Jôgen

biography.bio: Tomo Muranaka is an actress, known for Ghost in the Shell Arise: Border 1 - Ghost Pain (2013), Monster Strike the Movie (2016) and Ghost in the Shell Arise: Border 2 - Ghost Whisper (2013).
biography.name: Tomo Muranaka

biography.bio: Yuta Odagaki is an actor, known for Ghost in the Shell Arise: Border 1 - Ghost Pain (2013), Ghost in the Shell Arise: Border 4 - Ghost Stands Alone (2014) and Beyblade: Shogun Steel (2012).
biography.name: Yuta Odagaki

titlesAwards.titleAwardOutcome: Nominated BTVA Anime Dub Television/OVA Voice Acting Award

categories.category: Best Female Vocal Performance in an Anime Television Series/OVA in a Supporting Role
